trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class is an exception that occurs when the server returns an <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> é uma exceção que ocorre quando o servidor retorna um <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> object returned by the server that corresponds to the <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> retornado pelo servidor que corresponde ao <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified response object.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> usando o objeto de resposta especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default message displayed to the client is "<errorResponse> returned".
trans-unit.target: A mensagem padrão exibida para o cliente é “<errorResponse> retornado”.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem exibida para o cliente quando a exceção ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.String)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> usando a mensagem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> object returned by the server that corresponds to the <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> retornado pelo servidor que corresponde ao <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem exibida para o cliente quando a exceção ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse,System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified response object and message.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse,System.String)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> usando o a mensagem e o objeto de resposta especificados.

trans-unit.source: Data required to serialize the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Dados necessários para serializar o parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: A origem e o destino do fluxo serializado associado ao parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified serialization data and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> usando os dados de serialização e o contexto de streaming especificados.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem exibida para o cliente quando a exceção ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, if any, that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, se houver, que gerou a exceção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> usando a mensagem especificada e a exceção interna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> object returned by the server that corresponds to the <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> retornado pelo servidor que corresponde ao <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem exibida para o cliente quando a exceção ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, if any, that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, se houver, que gerou a exceção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse,System.String,System.Exception)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified response object, message, and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse,System.String,System.Exception)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> usando a mensagem, a exceção interna e o objeto de resposta especificados.

trans-unit.source: Data required to serialize the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Dados necessários para serializar o parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: A origem e o destino do fluxo serializado associado ao parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> method populates the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with the data required to serialize the parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> popula o objeto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> com os dados necessários para serializar o parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.Response" /> property contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> object that corresponds to the <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.Response" /> contém o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> que corresponde ao <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> object that corresponds to the <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> que corresponde ao objeto de <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
